item.title: Report E-2025050241
item.description:
Report E-2025050241

Identified by scraper @ 2025-06-10T03:46:53+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-05-13
  • City: HORSE CAVE
  • State: KY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: R & L CARRIERS, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 5000
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On May 13, 2025, four (4) 5-gallon pails of adhesives (UN1133) were crushed in transit and released approximately twenty (20) gallons of product to the trailer floor, trailer exterior, concrete beneath the trailer, and adjacent pails. R+L Carriers retained Cura Emergency Services, LC who dispatched a crew from TPM Group (TPM) to remediate the site. The crew utilized cleaners and absorbents pads as well as granular absorbents and hand tools to remove the released product from the site. All impacted materials were containerized in one (1) 55-gallon drum. The damaged pails were containerized in one (1) supersack. Any other adhesive-impacted pails were containerized in one (1) additional supersack.

item.title: Report X-2025051185
item.description:
Report X-2025051185

Identified by scraper @ 2025-06-10T03:46:53+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-05-10
  • City: LOUISVILLE
  • State: KY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDED TO ONE LEAKING AIR PACKAGE IN A UPS EXPRESS PACK. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED A SINGLE 14 OUNCE CAN OF COFFEE MATE COLD FOAM CREAMER LEAKING FROM THE CLOSURE. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER PACKAGING. THIS PACKAGE WAS DROPPED OFF IN NEW JERSEY USING UPS ACCOUNT NUMBER 45R4A5, ZEROLINK CLOVER HILL VINEYA, 9850 NEWTON RD, BREINIGSVILLE PA 18031-1808. THE ACCOUNT USAGE IS SUSPECTED TO BE UNAUTHORIZED.

item.title: Report E-2025050403
item.description:
Report E-2025050403

Identified by scraper @ 2025-06-10T03:46:53+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-04-24
  • City: LOUISVILLE
  • State: KY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident

  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO ENTERPRISE SERVICES, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: At 1918 ET, XPO notified ERTS of a cargo release at terminal XLU. It was reported that approximately 1/2 gallon of DTM Black Alkyd Nonskid Metal Adhesion Plus was released from a 1-gallon metal can due to a forklift accident. The release impacted the concrete at dock door 9. ERTS reviewed the SDS with the caller and they felt comfortable cleaning up the release with PPE available on-site. Called Chemtrec and spoke to Bud. Report #20250424-386767. 234346-1 â€“ 20-gallon DF contains a 1-gallon metal can of DTM Black Alkyd Nonskid Metal Adhesion Plus and oil dri

  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Associate did not block and/or brace freight properly for transport. Freight was crushed causing release of product.

item.title: Report X-2025050552
item.description:
Report X-2025050552

Identified by scraper @ 2025-06-10T03:46:53+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-04-19
  • City: LOUISVILLE
  • State: KY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: ONE AIR PACKAGE CONTAINING A FULLY REGULATED DANGEROUS GOODS WAS FOUND LEAKING AT THE UPS WORLDPORT FACILITY IN LOUISVILLE, KENTUCKY. DURING PACKAGE INSPECTION THERE ARE FOUR CONTAINERS EACH AT ONE GALLON CAPACITY EACH INDIVIDUALLY BAGGED. ONE CONTAINER HAS LEAKED INSIDE THE BAG AND HAS SEEPED FROM THE BAG INTO THE FIBERBOARD BOX. THE PRODUCT IS PPG SPORTS COATINGS PROKOTE 230056GB URETHANE HARDENER. THE OUTER BOX IS UN SPECIFICATION WITH APPROPRIATELY APPLIED DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS AND LABELS. THE PACKAGE HAD PREVIOUSLY PASSED AN ACCEPTANCE AUDIT AT THE ORIGIN FACILITY.

item.title: Report E-2025050144
item.description:
Report E-2025050144

Identified by scraper @ 2025-06-10T03:46:53+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-04-10
  • City: LOUISVILLE
  • State: KY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: At 0924 ET, XPO-XLU notified ERTS of a cargo release. It was reported that approximately 2 quarts of battery acid released from a battery due to a forklift puncture. The release impacted inside trailer#463-2561, and the concrete dock. ERTS reviewed the SDS with the caller and determined that terminal personnel are capable of cleaning the release with PPE available on site. 233589-1 65-gallon poly drum - battery only 233589-2 65-gallon poly drum - oil dri, product, shrink-wrap.
